Крутая игра особенно в совмесном режиме когда твой друг идиот орёт "ДИБИЛ ТЫ НЕ ТУДА ПОРТАЛ СТАВИШЬ!!" + постоянно убивает тебя фейк порталами короче весело

Игра класс, понравился сюжет. Задумка с порталами, и другими элементами по типу световых мостов прикольная, в некоторых местах можно застрять, долго стоять и думать, либо это просто в моём случае, по тупости)))

Very fun, i love wheatley he is my little meow meow
Not a game for the mindless ones, to be sure.

This game is to me the definition of a great sequel. It expands from the foundation from portal 1, The characters are perfect, And Cave Johnson is really funny. Overall this game is worth more then the $10 i paid for it and i would recommend this game to anyone who is looking for a fun game to play.

this game is truly a mark in history, if only valve was still capable of producing master pieces like this. if you some how haven't played portal 2 in the time of 2022 please do your self a favor and buy this game.
recomendo jogar o coop principalmente quando tem 2 burroide jogando
Very fun, I enjoyed this immensely! A great successor to Portal! I very much recommend! It's a bit more challenging which I think is fitting for a sequel.
me gustab mucho lo recomiendo a las personas que ya jugaron portal 1

Another masterpiece of a puzzle game! If you liked the first one, this is right up your alley! The cake may still be a lie, but you aren't stapled to a board when it comes to the community or even the CO-OP! The CO-OP is fun with new story featuring two robots, P-Body and Atlas!
Its really fun to solve each test and puzzle even if you're not really into puzzle games

how are you holding up? BECAUSE IM A POTATO
game very good you place portal and you go through very simple yet very complex

i beat the entire game in the one sitting

10/10
Probably the best steam game i've played in a while.

One of the most iconic games. It expands upon everything from the first to create a fun, story driven puzzler. The puzzles are challenging and creative and the game is incredibly enjoyable. A must play for any PC gamer.
EXCELENTE es lo poco que puedo decir de este juego, si no lo jugaste o tenes dudas, te estas perdiendo de un juegazo.

It's a great game. Even if you are playing it for the tenth time in a row, it still is challenging. At least a bit. Nothing is like Portal.
And remember:
The Cake is a lie
Un juego que me hizo pensar de mas................... es normal que me guste glados?
very enjoyable game , worth the money

The BEST game i've ever played! You don't see this much phisics even in new AAA titles! The soundtrack is absoloutly awesome and puzzles are chellanging enought so you're not bored but are simple enought that you don't get frustrated. If you didn't play Portal 2, you should.

All achievements in 32 hours, and honestly I took it very slowly. Would definitely recommend, one of the best games ever made. Especially for the coop mode !

One of the greatest games ever made, and one of the greatest squeals! Everyone needs to try this game out, if you don't want to pay 10$ for this masterpiece wait for a steam sale since it's always discounted.

MANO...ISSO QUE É UMA SEQUENCIA DE RESPEITO, MDS, tudo que já era bom ou incrível no um ficou mais incrível ainda, a historia, ambientação, OS DIÁLOGOS MDS QUE COISA LINDA, direto eu ria com o q eu tava lendo, um game Completo, Lindo, DELICIOSO SEI LÁ NÃO SEI MAIS O Q FALAR,
e quando parece que acabou eu descubro o multiplayer.... MANO são praticamente 2 jogos em um... quando foi a ultima vez que eu vi um Game com tanto amor na produção como esse, na moral...
Garanto que mesmo depois que terminar você ainda vai lembrar dele com Carinho e de o quão Única sua experiência foi

Agora um espacinho pro meu Brother que me aturou no Multiplayer kjk

Mattheown: cara eu poderia dizer muita coisa mas vei .... joguei o um, rejoguei, e platinei e como pode ver eu não gosto nem um pouco do game , mas vei........o dois ficou incrível e como eu posso dizer isso de maneira mais rápida do que....cara esse jogo me fez gostar da glados.....preciso dizer alguma coisa...

é muito bom, cheio de puzzles, recomendo!

[h1]Steam義務教育と言われるだけある、不朽の名作[/h1]
斬新なゲームシステムを取り入れた一人称視点3Dパズルゲームの金字塔「Portal」の続編。基本的なシステムは前作と変わらず、いくつかの仕掛けが新たに追加、さらにHalfLifeなどとも繋がるよく作り込まれたストーリーが特徴。人っ子一人いない研究施設ApertureScienceEnrichmentCentreの謎が遂に解ける(かもしれない)。是非一度やってみてほしい。
なお3D酔いしやすいゲームなので注意。あとPortal前作をやってないとストーリーがよくわからないかもしれない。[spoiler]あなたが殺した彼女と聞いてピンとこない人は前作を復習しよう！[/spoiler]
セール時は1,2合わせて120円とかになったりするから後悔しないように。
解密难度较高，适合重度解密玩家入手。中后段有大量剧情，建议开启中文字幕。

Great game, amazing gameplay, even better lore. Literally love it. One of my favorite games. The puzzles are interesting and often require quick thinking. The setting has a unique theme and features scenes that I haven't seen in any other game. I havent tested out the multiplayer mode yet but 100% I'd reccomend this game.
Отличная игра, особенно за свои деньги

Portal 2 вышел в 2011 году, и за 11 лет игра не стала хуже. Я думаю что для того времени такой способ перемещаться был на уровне наилучшего. На сегодняшний день игра не стала хуже, но и не лучше. Все равно порталы и сетевая игра могут вас на долго там оставить(но меня хватило на 5 часов).
это очень интересная игра головоломка,в которой предстоит научиться пользоваться портальной пушкой
